mapper.select: SELECT A.PK_DICTIONARY_SEQ AS pkDictionarySeq , A.PK_USER_SEQ AS pkUserSeq , A.CLASS AS classId , A.WORD AS word , A.CONENT AS content , A.REGIST_ID AS registId , A.UPDATE_ID AS updateId , A.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt FROM AI_DICTIONARY A INNER JOIN AI_DICTIONARY_RESULT B ON A.PK_DICTIONARY_SEQ = B.PK_DICTIONARY_SEQ WHERE B.PK_USER_SEQ = #{pkUserSeq}

SELECT A.PK_DICTIONARY_SEQ AS pkDictionarySeq , A.PK_USER_SEQ AS pkUserSeq , A.CLASS AS classId , A.WORD AS word , A.CONTENT AS content , A.REGIST_ID AS registId , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGIST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS registDt , A.UPDATE_ID AS updateId , A.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt FROM AI_DICTIONARY A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.PK_DICTIONARY_SEQ ASC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT A.PK_DICTIONARY_SEQ AS pkDictionarySeq , A.PK_USER_SEQ AS pkUserSeq , A.CLASS AS classId , A.WORD AS word , A.CONTENT AS content , A.REGIST_ID AS registId , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGIST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS registDt , A.UPDATE_ID AS updateId , A.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt FROM AI_DICTIONARY A WHERE A.PK_DICTIONARY_SEQ = #{pkDictionarySeq}
